channel.title: Projects on Dang-Khoa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Dang-Khoa's blog

item.title: Urban-Area Scene-Based Localization
item.description: My main role is to develop the localization system for the MinDef project. Besides, I conducted research on Deep Image Retrieval and 3D reconstructions. Develop the on-device urban scane-based localization system on Android devices. There are some major components I have implemented on mobile: Image Retrieval (Triangluation Embedding (CPU + GPU)) Vector Quantization (Product Quantization). Hashing-based Image Matching. Pose Estimation Implement and conduct experiments on deep hashing image retrieval and feature learning.
